main.name: Abdul Rafay Salfi
main.description: I am a curious software engineer and like to learn new technologies and solve problems. Everytime I hear about a new technology, I get curious, I wanna learn what is this technology. After learning I like to apply my new skills to learn new problems.
main.bio: I work as a full stack web developer at GagaMuller Technology, Islamabad. I use ASP.Net Core, Entity Framework and MYSQL and SQL for developing backend of applications and angular, React for frontend. In my free time, I learn new skills, technologies, read novels and watch movies. I am pretty determined if I decide to solve a problem I put my full concentration on solving that problem.

education.school: Capital University of Science and Technology
education.description: I had wonderful experience during my bachelor time. I learned how internet works, how web apps and mobile apps are created and worked behind the scene and learned git and github, mobile and web application development.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer Software Engineer-1
work.description: I work as a Full Stack Developer at GagaMuller Technology, Islamabad. I use ASP.Net Core, Entity Framework and MYSQL and SQL for developing backend of applications and angular, React for frontend. I use azure devops cloud services for CI/CD and Version Control System Git.

skills.name: Machine Learning, Data Science and AI

projects.title: LinkedIn Clone - React Js
projects.category: Website I built to learn React Js

testimonials.text: Don't ever let you disability define you. You are unique and you can do anything. Don't ever lose hope. I have seen a problem solver in you have what it takes to be a problem solver.
